root.name: Distance Transforms
root.description: Computes fast quasi-exact euclidean distance transforms in 2D/3D from a set of regions of interest.
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:
- Version 2.1.2.0 Date 2017-03-24 18:51:29
Improved performance on 3D mesh ROI
- Version 2.1.1.0 Date 2017-02-21 11:53:22
Fixed the data iterator issue (hopefully one last time!)
- Version 2.1.0.0 Date 2017-02-20 20:46:24
* Circumvent an issue in SequenceDataIterator (Icy versions up to 1.8.6) * New: multi-thread computation on time-lapse data
- Version 2.0.4.0 Date 2017-02-20 14:59:00
Fixed an issue on the 3D Chamfer3 algorithm
- Version 2.0.3.0 Date 2017-02-20 12:44:41
Fixed an issue introduced in the previous update where in temporal (T=-1) ROI were not processed correctly
- Version 2.0.2.0 Date 2017-02-13 17:30:00
Fixed an issue with time series analysis
- Version 2.0.1.0 Date 2017-01-11 19:03:21
Fixed an issue in the 5x5x5 Chamfer distance algorithm
- Version 2.0.0.0 Date 2015-05-20 13:53:45
* Code refactoring & simplification. * Pixel size can be taken into account * 2D ROI with a specific Z can now be used to calculate 3D maps
- Version 1.1.1.0 Date 2015-03-25 09:24:22
Fixed handling of multiple ROI
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2015-03-19 11:33:32
Fixed distance map computation in 3D
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2014-06-27 01:24:12
Bumped version to 1.0 (no code change)
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2014-06-27 01:22:15
